def_cn: 无花果树叶(在绘画和雕塑中有时被用作遮羞物)
def_en: A fig leaf is a large leaf which comes from the fig tree. A fig leaf is sometimes used in painting and sculpture to cover the genitals of a naked body.
People sometimes refer disapprovingly to something which is intended to hide or prevent an embarrassing situation as a fig leaf .
